tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_containers (
  container_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  container_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  capacity INTEGER NOT NULL,
  current_inventory INTEGER NOT NULL,
  last_restock_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE restocking_history (
  restocking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  container_id UUID,
  restocked_date DATE,
  restocked_by VARCHAR(255),
  restocked_amount INT
);

CREATE TABLE waste_containers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    container_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    current_stock INT,
    capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE restocking_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    container_id INT,
    restocked_date DATE,
    restocked_quantity INT,
    restocked_by VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteDisposalContainers (
  container_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  container_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  capacity INT NOT NULL,
  current_level INT NOT NULL,
  last_restock_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE WasteMaterials (
  material_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE RestockingHistory (
  restock_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  container_id UUID NOT NULL,
  restock_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Employees (
  employee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE InventoryUpdates (
  update_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  container_id UUID NOT NULL,
  updated_level INT NOT NULL,
  update_date DATE NOT NULL
)
